title: [Bug]: Download of files is not possible
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

No

### Describe the bug

I can not download files via the flatpack. I use the web app as a workaround as of right now.  I am running the up to date version of opensuse tumbleweed

### What package are you using?

flatpak

### Version

1.13.1

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1. Open the App
2. Go to any team -> select a channel -> select a file
3. Click download via the top button or via the 3 dots on the right
4. No window opens to select a file location and it is not directly downloaded to the downloads folder
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

_No response_
